com.barchart.feed.ddf.settings.api
Interface DDF_Login

@NotMutable
public interface DDF_Login

Encapsulates all necessary data for a user login.

Method Summary

          Call to determine the status of a login attempt.

Method Detail

getUsername

String getUsername()
Returns:
The Barchart given user name used to populate login data.

getStatus

String getStatus()
Call to determine the status of a login attempt.

Returns:
String "ok" if user name is valid.

getCredentials

String getCredentials()
Call to determine the status of a login attempt.

Returns:
String "ok" if both user name and password are valid.

getServiceId

String getServiceId()
What is the serviceId? How is it used?

Returns:

getMaxSymbols

int getMaxSymbols()
Returns:
The maximum number of symbols the user is allowed to listen to on this connection.

getExchangeSet

Set<String> getExchangeSet()
Returns:
The set of exchanges available to the user from this connection.

isValid

boolean isValid()
Returns:
Returns true if both getStatus() and getCredentials() return "ok".
